message------------------------------------------------------------------------:Sample Code: .. code:: python import msgfy def error_message_example(): try: raise ValueError("example message") except python import msgfy def error_message_format_example(): try: raise ValueError("example error message") except ValueError as e: print(msgfy.to_error_message(e, "{exception} {func_name}: {error_msg}")) error_message_format_example():Output: :: ValueError error_message_format_example: example error messageConvert from Exception instance to a debug for message formats~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~+---------------------+-----------------------------------------------+| Keyword | Replaced to |+=====================+===============================================+| ``"{exception}"`` | Exception class name |+---------------------+-----------------------------------------------+| ``"{file_name}"`` | File name that exception raised |+---------------------+-----------------------------------------------+| ``"{line_no}"`` | Line number where the exception raised |+---------------------+-----------------------------------------------+| ``"{func_name}"`` | Function name that exception raised |+---------------------+-----------------------------------------------+| ``"{error_msg}"`` | Message that passed to the exception instance
